title: FS - T3 Turkey Reds - All Sold
author: jayshum

posts.post_title: FS - T3 Turkey Reds - All Sold
posts.post_content:
The Willis is all that is left.  A nice looking card as seen in the pictures with obvious corner wear, some light creasing in the bottom, left corner, a small stain mark on the right border and a few small spots of paper loss.

SOLD $325 net amount to me via PayPal or check - includes insured Priority Mail shipping. PM me or email me at [url]jandcristi@verizon.net[/url] to purchase. Feel free to make an offer as well. Jay



Keeler Ad Back - $250, several creases, a tear from the left border to near his arm and a tear on the right border near the center of the card SOLD
Hoblitzell Ad Back - $115, crease in top right corner and small tear about 1/4 of the way down on the left border SOLD
Elberfeld - $115, small tear from bottom up through the name and small tear on left border a few inches down from the top of the card SOLD
Magee - $140, several small tears around border SOLD
bump - Willis is only one left
